Tweets.description: First ad for the Roswell Paradox: The Temporal Key.
Tweets.text: Stranded in the distant past, attempting to preserve an uncertain future.\nThe Roswell Paradox book 1 is an adventure in time that stretches across millions of years. Sometimes the only way forward is back.\n

Tweets.description: First Ad for the Roswell Paradox Book 2: Iteration
Tweets.text: Labeled as a Temporal Fugitives, Dayk must find a way to stop agents from ruining the future.\Iteration is the trhilling climax to The Temporal Key!
